snippet.title: Introducing Army of Tactics | The first Web3 Auto-Battler Mobile Game
snippet.description:
🎮 Play Army of Tactics now for free, download here: https://armyoftactics.go.link?adj_t=18blsu4e

00.00 What is Army of Tactics?
00:33 Heroes and battle decks
00:50 How to battle
01:32 Coins and resources
01:50 Summary 

Army of Tactics is the first game from the AOFverse. It’s an auto battler/auto chess mobile game allowing you to build and command your own armies, upgrade your island, gather resources and master quests as you advance through the islands, defeating your enemies.
